title: World Cup Pro Bike Check: Luca Braidot’s Santa Cruz Blur with custom-tuned suspension
content:
Sunday’s World Cup at Snow Shoe West Virginia was the last of the 2021 OXC season, and riders were looking to best their previous result. Luca Braidot from Santa Cruz FSA found himself in the lead group for most of the race, trading wheels with Blevins, Schurter, and Cink. The 30-year-old Italian XCO specialist is

The post World Cup Pro Bike Check: Luca Braidot’s Santa Cruz Blur with custom-tuned suspension appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jordan Villella
